basics.name: Michael Robinson
basics.label: Software Engineer
basics.summary: I am a full stack software engineer with a focus on JavaScript, C# and .NET. I have also experience in Node, Python, Java, Golang, PHP, C++, HTML, CSS, SASS, SCSS, Bower, NPM, Babel, Webpack, Grunt, React, Vue, Knockout, Angular, TypeScript, ASP.NET, MVC, Web API, DDD, SOLID, TDD, BDD, XP, Agile, Scrum, JIRA, Confluence, and Bitbucket.

references.reference: I worked alongside Michael on several projects at PanAmSat. Michael is an excellent team player and highly valued engineer. When tasked with difficult problems or delivery schedules he consistently exceeded expectations.
references.name: Contact Available Upon Request

highlights: Developed Web API and SPA in React.js to support a Point of Sale application
Developed cross-platform application in Vue.js to support a Point of Sale application
work.summary: Shopify is a commerce platform that allows anyone to easily sell online, at a retail location, and everywhere in between. Shopifyâ€™s 170,000 merchants can use the software to design, set up, and manage their stores across multiple sales channels, and have access to a suite of analytics tools to track their business.

highlights: Performed system level analysis and software design
Developed software for DSP applications and satellite control systems
work.summary: PanAmSat was a multinational provider of satellite services, headquartered in Bethesda, Maryland, United States. It was created in 1996 by the merger of PanAmSat and SatCom. The company was purchased by Hughes Electronics, which itself was later purchased by the Boeing Company in 2000.
